ingredients.item: 200g large cooked, peeled prawns, defrosted if frozen
½ x 25g pack fresh parsley, chopped

instructions.step: Heat the oil and fry the onion and pepper for 2-3 minutes. Add the cajun seasoning and rice and cook for 1 minute. Stir in the tomatoes with the stock, cover and simmer gently for 12 minutes.

Stir in the sweetcorn and couscous and cook for a further 10-15 minutes until the rice is just tender. Add the prawns and cook for 1-2 minutes to heat through. Season and sprinkle with parsley to serve.
